text:
@JustinTrudeau So , how many job Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is holding .
Full time Prime Minister -part time teacher -full time father & husband part time COVID19 .That's a multi task . But he doesn't have to worry about food . Canadian government will provide .Thanks for free job . https://t.co/lEmAUATf7B
